title: Hezbollah Announces "New Phase" Of War, Israel Issues "Hit Anyone" Warning
content: Israel and Hezbollah have threatened to intensify their cross-border attacks, disregarding calls from the international community to de-escalate and step back from a potential all-out war.
summary: Israel and Hezbollah have threatened to intensify their cross-border attacks, disregarding calls from the international community to de-escalate and step back from a potential all-out war.

title: Man Gets Huge Monster Energy Drink Logo Tattooed On Chest, Company Reacts
content: A man's bold decision to get the Monster Energy Drink logo tattooed across his chest has sparked amusement online.
summary: A man's bold decision to get the Monster Energy Drink logo tattooed across his chest has sparked amusement online.

title: US Boy Who Was Kidnapped From California In 1951 Returns 70 Years Later
content: A man who was abducted as a six-year-old boy over 70 years ago has been found alive on the East Coast of the United States. Luis Armando Albino disappeared on February 21, 1951, from a park in West Oakland, California.
summary: A man who was abducted as a six-year-old boy over 70 years ago has been found alive on the East Coast of the United States. Luis Armando Albino disappeared on February 21, 1951, from a park in West Oakland, California.

title: OpenAI CEO Sam Altman Reveals His Top Strategy For Life Without Regrets
content: In 2005, he made a career-defining decision by dropping out of Stanford to create Loopt, a location-based social networking app.
summary: In 2005, he made a career-defining decision by dropping out of Stanford to create Loopt, a location-based social networking app.

title: Zelensky In US, Set To Explain War Plan To Biden, Harris, Trump
content: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky on Sunday arrived in the United States for a crucial visit to present Kyiv's plan to end two and a half years of war with Russia.
summary: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky on Sunday arrived in the United States for a crucial visit to present Kyiv's plan to end two and a half years of war with Russia.

title: Google To Nvidia: PM Modi's Roundtable Meet With 15 Tech CEOs At MIT
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi today convened a high-profile roundtable with top American technology CEOs, focusing on innovation, collaboration, and India's growing tech space.
summary: Prime Minister Narendra Modi today convened a high-profile roundtable with top American technology CEOs, focusing on innovation, collaboration, and India's growing tech space.

title: Elon Musk Plans To Send Five Uncrewed Starships to Mars In Two Years
content: SpaceX plans to launch about five uncrewed Starship missions to Mars in two years, CEO Elon Musk said on Sunday in a post on social media platform X.
summary: SpaceX plans to launch about five uncrewed Starship missions to Mars in two years, CEO Elon Musk said on Sunday in a post on social media platform X.

title: PM Modi Meets Palestinian President, Expresses "Deep Concern" Over Gaza
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi held a bilateral meeting with Palestinian President Mahmoud Abbas at Lotte New York Palace Hotel in New York on Sunday.
summary: Prime Minister Narendra Modi held a bilateral meeting with Palestinian President Mahmoud Abbas at Lotte New York Palace Hotel in New York on Sunday.

title: PM Modi Holds Bilateral Meeting With Kuwait Crown Prince In New York
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi held a bilateral meeting with Kuwait Crown Prince, Sheikh Sabah Khaled Al-Hamad Al-Sabah Al-Sabah, in New York on Sunday (local time).
summary: Prime Minister Narendra Modi held a bilateral meeting with Kuwait Crown Prince, Sheikh Sabah Khaled Al-Hamad Al-Sabah Al-Sabah, in New York on Sunday (local time).

title: "That Will Be It": Trump Says He Will Not Run Again If He Loses In November
content: Republican Donald Trump said that he will not make a fourth consecutive run for the U.S. presidency if he loses the Nov. 5 election, saying "that will be it" in an interview released on Sunday.
summary: Republican Donald Trump said that he will not make a fourth consecutive run for the U.S. presidency if he loses the Nov. 5 election, saying "that will be it" in an interview released on Sunday.

title: PM Modi Meets Tech CEOs In New York, Discusses Emerging Technology
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi met a host of industry leaders, ranging from semiconductors to electronics to biotechnology, where they discussed the potential and opportunities India has to offer.
summary: Prime Minister Narendra Modi met a host of industry leaders, ranging from semiconductors to electronics to biotechnology, where they discussed the potential and opportunities India has to offer.

title: India Is Voice Of The Global South, World Listens When We Speak: PM Modi
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi today highlighted the growing stature of India at the global platform and said that "the world listens when India speaks."
summary: Prime Minister Narendra Modi today highlighted the growing stature of India at the global platform and said that "the world listens when India speaks."

title: First India-US Semiconductor Fabrication Cooperation Of Its Kind A Reality
content: US President Joe Biden and Prime Minister Narendra Modi hailed a watershed arrangement to set up a semiconductor fabrication plant focused on advanced sensing.
summary: US President Joe Biden and Prime Minister Narendra Modi hailed a watershed arrangement to set up a semiconductor fabrication plant focused on advanced sensing.

title: Pics: Indian Community's Big Welcome For PM Modi In US
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi received an enthusiastic welcome in Philadelphia as he kicked off his three-day visit to the United States, on Saturday.
summary: Prime Minister Narendra Modi received an enthusiastic welcome in Philadelphia as he kicked off his three-day visit to the United States, on Saturday.

title: PM Congratulates Anura Dissanayake For Victory In Lankan Presidential Poll
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Sunday congratulated Anura Kumara Dissanayake for his victory in the Sri Lankan presidential election.
summary: Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Sunday congratulated Anura Kumara Dissanayake for his victory in the Sri Lankan presidential election.

title: "For Me, AI Means 'American-Indian' Spirit": PM Modi In US
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Sunday (local time) highlighted the relationship between India and the US in terms of artificial intelligence and gave a new meaning to it, describing it as the America-India spirit.
summary: Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Sunday (local time) highlighted the relationship between India and the US in terms of artificial intelligence and gave a new meaning to it, describing it as the America-India spirit.

title: "India Has Come Forward As First Responder Whenever There Is Disaster": PM
content: India does not seek its dominance but wants to play a role in the prosperity of the world, Prime Minister Narendra Modi said on Sunday, asserting that India's role will be crucial in accelerating the global peace process.
summary: India does not seek its dominance but wants to play a role in the prosperity of the world, Prime Minister Narendra Modi said on Sunday, asserting that India's role will be crucial in accelerating the global peace process.

title: India To Open 2 New Consulates In Boston, Los Angeles: PM Modi In New York
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Sunday announced the Indian government will open two new consulates in the US -- one in Boston, and another in Los Angeles.
summary: Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Sunday announced the Indian government will open two new consulates in the US -- one in Boston, and another in Los Angeles.

title: India Has "No Role In Causing Destruction": PM On Climate Change In US
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Sunday said that India has no role in causing destruction to the world, in an apparent criticism of the West.
summary: Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Sunday said that India has no role in causing destruction to the world, in an apparent criticism of the West.

title: Day Not Far When You Will See Made In India Chip In America: PM In New York
content: India is a launching pad of all sorts of technologies and the country now aspires to see 'Made in India' semiconductor chips running devices globally, Prime Minister Narendra Modi told a large gathering of Indian Americans in New York on the second d
